name: Beach Commando Warrior Blitz: Army Combat War Battle Forces
name_original: Beach Commando Warrior Blitz: Army Combat War Battle Forces
description:
The beach is under attack and you must help protect it!

Beach Commando Warrior Blitz is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for everyone. Put up a fight to keep the enemy forces from taking over!

Do you think you have what it takes to survive the mean realities of war? Can you collect enough coins along the way? The game will start moving faster and faster, so watch out for those enemies! Collect those power-ups to help you out even more!

Collect enough coins and you can unlock more soldiers for even more fun! Collect those powerups!

*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect coins to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for everyone
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch

Download Beach Commando Warrior Blitz right now while it's 100% FREE!
